backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue, activities, moments, and player progression with start/continue APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode colors.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Guide outlining canister uptime limitations and operational steps for keeping the backend running.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling startup, screen navigation, backend calls, server-access gating, and diagnostics.
Defines activity data including trust effects, descriptions, and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Manages audio settings and background music playback using a persisted Zustand store.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: 3D Puro character component with idle animation and click/hover interactions that trigger dialogue.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Touch-based joystick and look controls for mobile devices, updating player movement and camera look.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Aggregates keyboard, joystick, and look input into normalized movement and look deltas, respecting pause and terminal states.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Lists customization items with descriptions and allowed placement locations.
Contains dialogue nodes and choices forming a branching dialogue tree with trust effects and requirements.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game view component that initializes state, mounts the 3D scene, manages UI panels, audio, and pause handling.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates contextual letter responses based on keywords, using friendly, curious, or encouraging templates.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: A drag-and-drop book sorting game that adjusts trust based on correct or incorrect placements and signals completion when all books are sorted.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A drawing viewer that lets players browse Puro's sketches, increasing trust when new drawings are viewed and awarding a bonus when all are seen.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide‑and‑seek guessing game where players choose hiding spots, affecting trust based on speed and accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Launches and manages transitions between available minigames, returning to a menu when games finish or close.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with title, scene text, and a close button in a modal-style layout.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines Moment data with titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements for story moments.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library environment with movement controls, lighting, props, and the Puro character, updating camera and player position each frame.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store managing trust, dialogue, activities, items, letters, endings, and UI visibility, with actions to update each.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Declares ending definitions with trust thresholds and provides a function to select an ending based on trust level.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Renders the final ending scene based on trust level and allows starting a new game or returning to the title screen.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Displays available activities, updates trust and completed activities, unlocks moments, and closes the menu on selection.
Shows discovered and placed customization items, letting players place new items in the library.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Handles dialogue display and branching choices, updating trust and navigating dialogue nodes.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Allows writing letters, auto-generates delayed responses, and displays inbox messages.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a list of moments, showing locked/unlocked status and allowing playback of unlocked moments.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Renders the pause menu with resume, navigation shortcuts, settings, terminal access, and progress reset options.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides UI controls for audio mute and volume settings with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows the player's trust level with a label, color indicator, and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend availability via actor.isAvailable and exposes status, errors, and refetching utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, login flow, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for game-related backend calls, including game state, actions, and progress updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a warm color palette with light and dark theme CSS variables and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one-time app initialization including storage checks and critical asset preloading with idempotent startup control.
Zustand store managing a persisted boolean flag for enabling or disabling server access.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Renders a credits page with game info, features, and a link attribution, including a background image and back button.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Implements an in‑game diagnostic terminal with input handling, command execution, keyboard shortcuts, and scrollable output.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays launch‑time error details with user‑friendly messaging, expandable technical info, and retry or back‑to‑title actions.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: A React error boundary that catches runtime errors in the game, shows an error screen, and allows viewing technical details.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Defines terminal command handling for diagnostics, server-access toggles, and server status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic data into readable terminal output lines for debugging.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Implements a Zustand store for terminal state, output history, and input/output append helpers.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the main title screen UI with server-access toggles, server status alerts, and buttons for game actions.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into user-friendly summaries with categorized error types.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation of the frontend startup process, initialization tasks, and extension guidelines.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and feature tracking information.
